metadata.document_title: SVA Data Catalogue Volume 2: Data Items
metadata.smart_level_notes: Level 2-3: Machine-readable. 420 data items extracted from Appendix C with descriptions, domains, formats, and valid sets. 89 items cross-referenced to NETA IDD Part 1. Semantic classifications and ontology candidates assigned. Data flow usage counts from Appendix B included.

appendices_parsed.A: Data Item Index (item names and definition sources)
appendices_parsed.B: Item in Data Flow (320 items mapped to data flow usage counts)
appendices_parsed.C: Data Item Definitions (420 full definitions extracted)
appendices_parsed.D: Data Items Having Synonyms (synonym relationships captured)
